H0.text: Adelle receiving an artificial hip to ease her arthritis is the surgery most like the way a transgenic organism is made.

H1.text: Kwan receives a pacemaker to regulate his heartbeat is the surgery most like the way a transgenic organism is made.

H2.text: Hector receives a replacement heart valve from a cow is the surgery most like the way a transgenic organism is made, because both involve transferring biological material from one species to another.

H3.text: Denise receiving a kidney donated by her identical twin is the surgery most like the way a transgenic organism is made.

A4.text: Transgenesis involves transferring a gene from one organism to another, altering the recipient's genome.

A5.text: Transgene introduction can replace a host gene with one that codes for a different protein or add an entirely new gene.
